full_description:
EcoFlow DELTA Portable Power Station

The EcoFlow DELTA boasts a massive 1260Wh capacity that can keep your home devices fully charged during power outages and emergencies. It can charge from 0-80% in under an hour, providing you with a quick boost of power even in the worst situations. With 6x 1800W AC outlets, DELTA allows you to power essential devices when you're at home and heavy-duty power tools when you're working outdoors. It can power up to 13 devices simultaneously, providing enough power for brewing a cup of coffee, listening to your favorite radio station, or immersing yourself in Middle-earth once again. You can also harness the power of the sun by connecting DELTA to three 160W solar panels to fully charge in just 3.5-7 hours. Alternatively, you can connect DELTA to four 110W solar panels to fully charge in 4-8 hours.

product_page_short_description: Backup power for essential home appliances
full_description:
EcoFlow Smart Home Panel

EcoFlow Smart Home Panel connects EcoFlow DELTA Pro to your home to create a versatile, expandable home battery solution for storing energy for later use. Connect up to ten of your home circuits for power during blackouts, smart energy management, and more. All while saving money on the way. When a power outage occurs, the Smart Home Panel switches to your 10 integrated circuits and draws power from your DELTA Pro (s). With a 20ms switchover time, you'll barely notice a loss of power as your chosen circuits remain powered. The Smart Home Panel can support and charge up to two DELTA Pro(s) at the same time, as well as their extra batteries and smart generator (s). This gives you a potential 240V, 7200W output, and a capacity of 25kWh.

full_description:
EcoFlow RIVER 2 Portable Power Station

The EcoFlow RIVER 2 Portable Power Station - the next generation of portable power solutions designed to revolutionize your energy needs. RIVER 2 is a versatile and efficient power station with an array of features that make it an indispensable companion for both outdoor adventures and essential home backup. RIVER 2 shatters the industry standard for charging speeds, boasting the remarkable ability to go from 0% to 100% in just 60 minutes. This speed is five times faster than other portable power stations on the market and 38% quicker than its previous generation. With RIVER 2, you can fully charge it while you prepare for your last-minute trips, ensuring that you're always ready to hit the road. Powered by an upgraded long-lasting Lithium Iron Phosphate (LFP) battery chemistry, the RIVER 2 Series is engineered to withstand the test of time. You can charge and discharge it over 3000 times, which translates to roughly a decade of everyday use. This is six times longer than the industry average, making RIVER 2 Series not only safe but also highly efficient, even in warmer climates. This EcoFlow RIVER 2 Series is a pioneer in portable power stations, being the world's first to achieve TÜV Rheinland certification. This certification assures you of the highest safety standards and guarantees the reliability of your RIVER 2. You can rest easy knowing your power source is backed by a globally recognized certification for quality and safety. The RIVER 2 is equipped with a state-of-the-art Battery Management System (BMS) that continually monitors voltage, current, and temperature. This comprehensive system offers multiple layers of protection, ensuring the longevity and efficiency of your RIVER 2. With the BMS in place, your investment is optimized for maximum usage. RIVER 2 Series provides you with four different methods to recharge it, ensuring you're never left without power. Whether you're on the go or at home, you can charge it using AC power, in-car charging, solar panels, or wind turbines. This versatility makes RIVER 2 a reliable energy source in a variety of situations. With its compact and lightweight design, RIVER 2 is the ideal travel companion. It's 30% lighter than its predecessor, making it exceptionally easy to carry to all your outdoor activities, from off-grid camping trips to beachside barbecues. The EcoFlow RIVER 2 Portable Power Station is a game-changer in the world of portable energy solutions. Its rapid charging, impressive durability, safety certification, advanced protection systems, and versatile recharging options make it a must-have for those who require power at their fingertips, whether on the road or at home. RIVER 2 is your reliable partner for all your energy needs, ensuring that you're never left in the dark.

The EcoFlow RIVER Pro features X-Boost technology, enabling it to power high-wattage appliances up to 1800W, including hairdryers, vacuum cleaners, and even lawnmowers. It can be conveniently charged using an AC wall outlet, a 12V car adapter, or solar panels. By linking up to two 110W solar panels, you can fully charge the power station in under 4-8 hours. The power station is equipped with a comprehensive set of management systems and protections, including BMS, Over Voltage Protection, Overload Protection, Over Temperature Protection, Short Circuit Protection, Low-Temperature Protection, Low Voltage Protection, and Overcurrent Protection. It offers various input and output options, including AC, USB, USB-C, car power output, and DC5521 output.
